title: How do I take a screenshot?
answer:
To take a screenshot, use either of the following methods:   
 -  Simultaneously press the power and volume down buttons.   
 -  Flick down from the status bar to open the notification panel and touch Screenshot.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150730164334144001.png)

Screenshots are saved to Gallery. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150730164430409001.png)  

 The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
